How can I think of war when all my heart thinks of is Nashwa?

I would throw myself headlong into battle to win her interest, but she is too distracted by our weapons shortage to notice anything.

I hear Acarum arms their recruits by raiding mercenary camps. Could you do that for us?

We don't have soldiers to spare for such a mission, but if you hit the camps, the {@LinkCreature:32#8#Stalker Company destroyers} should have weapons enough for our recruits. Then Nashwa will be free to think about other things...like me!

This is superb. If I bring these to Nashwa, I'll be her hero!

Here's a token of my appreciation. Buy something nice to wear to our wedding!
The mercenary camps in the Gloomy Tundra are the best place to find weapons. You just have to kill the {@LinkCreature:32#8#Stalker Company destroyers}.

What kind of fool does he think I am? Khasib just brought me a pile of weapons as if they were a bouquet of flowers. What did he think I would do?

We're in the middle of a war and he's acting like a schoolboy. I think I let him down too gently. Next time I'm not going to be so patient.
